titleStmt.title: A second vindication of the magistracy and government of England by way of an answer to the several replies &c.
titleStmt.author: Shower, Bartholomew, Sir, 1658-1701.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Sir Bartholomew Shower.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
